Desc.eng: Mr. Van Helsing, you’re back! But where is my mate?
He performed his duty with courage and bravery. But the mission is not complete. We need you to finish what he started.
He… well, he told us to look for you in case he didn’t succeed. He also said you were the brains of this operation anyway.
I’ll prove that by not letting you get me killed. Instead, I’ll just give you this automated toolbox. Just plug it into the control stations and it’ll do the rest.
